alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nolan and southern Fisher Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Us-84 Near The Nolan- Fisher County Line, or over Wastella, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Roscoe, Roby, Sylvester, Wastella, Longworth, Gannon, Lake Sweetwater, Busby, Capitola and Us-84 Near The Nolan- Fisher County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 231 and 252. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
